titles.title: Long Range Bomber Expansion Act of 2020
Long Range Bomber Expansion Act of 2020
A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to recommend a minimum number of bomber aircraft.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Long Range Bomber Expansion Act of 2020
This bill requires the Department of Defense to submit to Congress recommendations for a minimum number of bomber aircraft, including penetrating bombers in addition to B-52H aircraft, to enable the Air Force to carry out its long-range strike mission.
